name: Of Croak and Sword
description:
Cutesy adventuring fantasy shlock, with a battle system based on Frogger. So, obviously, you play as a Frog Knight.

Sail to a remote town, plagued by a mysterious "local menace" that keeps running off with their gold. Upgrade your Sword. Pray at the Elemental Altar to infuse your sword with mystical rock-paper-scissors properties. Don't let the floating Leech creatures touch you with their tongue.

Controls:

  • Arrows: Movement
  • Z: Confirm
  • X: Cancel
  • Esc: Pause/Cancel
